synopses.synopsis: 30-minute detective adventure program based on the character created by Raymond Chandler. This program was first heard on NBC in the summer of 1947 starring Van Heflin in the title role. It reappeared on CBS in the Fall of 1948, starring Gerald Mohr as Marlowe. (Handbook of Old-Time Radio p.212)
